CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name = "Standard Opportunity", IMAGE("/resource/1721026275000/Standard_Opp_Record_Type","standard",20,128), IF( RecordType.Name = "On demand Opportunity", IMAGE("/resource/1721026456000/Occasional","On demand",20,128), IMAGE("/resource/1721026321000/Series","Series",20,128) ) )
CustomField.label: Category
